sentence.Network_en: It is this form that grows into the adult medusa jellyfish.

sentence.Network_en: According to myth, anyone looking at Medusa would turn into stone.
sentence.Network_cn: 根据神话, 任何人看一眼美杜莎就会变成石头.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...或多或少呈圆柱形或卵形，并长有众多用来移行的纤毛(微小的毛状突出物)。[1]2生物形态刺胞动物体的两种基本形态。水螅体(polyp；柄状附著型成体)与水母体(medusa钟状或伞状自由游泳型成体)皆可产生之。[1]3外形特征有腔肠动物所共有的幼虫形态，体呈长椭圆形，外胚层细胞排成一层，形成囊胚壁，内腔(囊胚腔)的全部或一部分充有内胚层细胞。外胚层细胞具有.

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous usually marine and free-swimming coelenterates that constitute the sexually reproductive forms of hydrozoans and scyphozoans
2. one of two forms that coelenterates take: is the free-swimming sexual stage in the life cycle of a coelenterate and has a gelatinous umbrella-shaped body and tentacles
